sentences.english: Article 6 While recruiting labour-contract workers, the enterprise shall state explicitly in the contract a probational period.
sentences.chinese: 第六条企业招用劳动合同制工人，应当订明试用期。

sentences.english: It’s much easier to take this step during the probationary period than it is later on.
sentences.chinese: 在试用期做出解雇的决定要比以后做出决定容易得多。

sentences.english: Saya will start teaching full-time after passing a trial term at a Tokyo primary school.

sentences.english: On this point, too, always use the probationary period as it was intended.

sentences.english: The trial period will start on the date of signature of this CONTRACT. The duration of the trial period is three (3) months.
sentences.chinese: 试用期自本合同签署之日起开始，时间为三个月。

sentences.english: I want to know the wage in my probationary period.
sentences.chinese: 我想问一下试用期我的工资是多少。

sentences.english: The month's trial over, oliver was formally apprenticed.
sentences.chinese: 一个月的试用期已经过去，奥立弗正式成为学徒。

sentences.english: The probationary period shall be included in the term of this Contract.
sentences.chinese: 试用期被包括在本合同的有效期限内。

sentences.english: An employer can only stipulate one probation period with a same worker.
sentences.chinese: 同一用人单位与同一劳动者只能约定一次试用期。

sentences.english: After the 30-day trial period expired, you were only able to use the no-charge capabilities.
